CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Camera travel speed through the tunnel (forward/reverse)
CONTROLS.NAME: path_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Animation speed of the triangular geometry sections
CONTROLS.NAME: tri_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Continuous rotation speed of the entire scene
CONTROLS.NAME: rot_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Fixed rotation angle for the scene orientation
CONTROLS.NAME: rot_base

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scale of surface pattern tiles (higher = smaller, more transparent)
CONTROLS.NAME: pattern_size

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flash light intensity (X: on beat, Y: base intensity)
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_control

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Toggle visibility of animated glowing snake tubes
CONTROLS.NAME: show_snakes

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Hue offset for triangle surface colors
CONTROLS.NAME: tri_hue

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: RGB color of the flashing light effect
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Hue offset for the glowing snake elements
CONTROLS.NAME: snake_hue

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response strength (X: bass level, Y: bass hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response curve (higher = more intense reaction)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_pow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Enable twisting deformation of geometry sections
CONTROLS.NAME: twist_on

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Blend ratio between linear and sine wave twisting
CONTROLS.NAME: twist_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Amount of linear twist applied along depth axis
CONTROLS.NAME: twist_straight

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Sine wave twist parameters (X: amplitude, Y: frequency)
CONTROLS.NAME: twist_sine

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Base tunnel warping (X: forward pull, Y: radial pull)
CONTROLS.NAME: warp_world

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Additional warping applied on bass hits for pumping effect
CONTROLS.NAME: warp_world_beat

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Opacity of media texture overlay on surfaces
CONTROLS.NAME: media_opacity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scale of media texture mapping (higher = zoomed in)
CONTROLS.NAME: media_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Offset position of media texture (X: horizontal, Y: vertical)
CONTROLS.NAME: media_offset

DESCRIPTION: Dive through an infinite synthwave tunnel of neon triangles and glowing geometry. This audio-reactive journey features cascading triangular patterns that pulse and twist with the music, creating a hypnotic path through electric blue and magenta space. Glowing snake-like tubes weave through the geometric landscape while reflective surfaces bounce light in mesmerizing patterns. Every bass hit transforms the tunnel with warping effects and intense flashes, making this the perfect centerpiece for live performances and VJ sets
TITLE: Neon Triangulator
